ame":"encryptedGates","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"estimatedGas","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"expectedBindingOutput0","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"expectedBindingOutput1","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"expectedBindingOutput2","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"expectedBindingOutput3","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"expectedOutputHash","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"committer","type":"address"}],"name":"getCommit","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"isExpired","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"numGates","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint32","name":"","type":"uint32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"numWires","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"puzzleBPointer","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"puzzleSeed","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"reclaimExpired","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"reveal","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"input","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"int8[48]","name":"puzzleSolution","type":"int8[48]"}],"name":"revealWithPuzzle","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"reward","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"scheme","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"secretExpiry","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"timeRemaining","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Security model:   Layer 1 (Topology): Structural mixing defeats pattern attacks   Layer 2 (LWE): Standard LWE with Gaussian noise (~2^112 security, n=384)   Layer 3 (Wire Binding): Full-rank linear map prevents mix-and-match   Layer 4 (Planted LWE): 3^48 \u2248 2^76 brute-force resistance KEY DIFFERENCE FROM V3: The planted secret is derived from the ACTUAL SECRET, not from each candidate input. This means:   - Honest solver (who knows secret) can compute plantedSecret = H(\"planted\", secret)   - Attacker must solve ternary LWE to find plantedSecret from stored (A, b)   - Puzzle is ONE per contract, providing 2^76 minimum work floor LWE Parameters: n=384, q=65521, \u03c3=8 (Gaussian noise added off-chain) Puzzle Parameters: n=48, m=72, q=2039, threshold=300","kind":"dev","methods":{"commit(bytes32)":{"details":"The commit hash MUST be keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, input))      This binds the commitment to your address, preventing front-running","params":{"commitHash":"Hash of (sender address, secret input)"}},"commitDelay()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of blocks to wait"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_puzzleBPointer":"SSTORE2 pointer to b vector (72 x u16, computed as A*plantedSecret + e)","_puzzleSeed":"Seed for deriving A matrix (public)"}},"encryptedGates()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of NTRU/LWE encrypted gates"}},"estimatedGas()":{"returns":{"_0":"Approximate gas units needed"}},"getCommit(address)":{"params":{"committer":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The committed hash (0 if none)","_1":"The block when committed (0 if none)"}},"revealWithPuzzle(bytes32,int8[48])":{"details":"The puzzleSolution should be computed off-chain as H(\"planted\", secret) \u2192 ternary      For honest solver who knows secret, this is trivial.      For attacker, must solve ternary LWE from stored (A, b)."},"reward()":{"returns":{"_0":"The ETH reward in wei"}},"scheme()":{"returns":{"_0":"Scheme name (e.g., \"min-core\", \"multi-gate-16\")"}}},"title":"TLOSWithPuzzleV4 - 4-Layer TLOS with Properly Integrated Puzzle","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Claimed(address,bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the honeypot is successfully claimed"},"Committed(address,bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a commitment is made"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"commit(bytes32)":{"notice":"Commit to a claim attempt (phase 1 of commit-reveal)"},"commitDelay()":{"notice":"Get the minimum blocks between commit and reveal"},"encryptedGates()":{"notice":"Get the number of encrypted gates in this honeypot"},"estimatedGas()":{"notice":"Get estimated gas cost for reveal() call"},"getCommit(address)":{"notice":"Get commitment info for an address"},"revealWithPuzzle(bytes32,int8[48])":{"notice":"Reveal with puzzle solution"},"reward()":{"notice":"Get the current reward amount"},"scheme()":{"notice":"Get the obfuscation scheme identifier"}},"notice":"Puzzle solution is derived from SECRET, not input - attacker must solve 2^76 LWE","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/TLOSWithPuzzleV4.sol":"TLOSWithPuzzleV4"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":ds-test/=lib/solmate/lib/ds-test/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":solmate/=lib/solmate/src/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/TLOSWithPuzzleV4.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa56138cbe9ce9dd2513388ff0d22bf53512aaf0494b13af50fcb307efe407442","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://481c27d07ad184a24ddc41d04a2a471b983b5c133bb30a9908480b0779b20ea5","dweb:/ipfs/QmYLzXaNmFoqs7qxatTyfvHzN4AFLutDzdV5vFiyDL7b4j"]},"contracts/interfaces/IHoneypot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe3fe92c331de7fd68fb2f07e3c210815901900cef08c903ce3a115c88b5f7cbe","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://841f494f2a109d136910ccf02d649b0fd20fd8ed72d553ecc8cda0fffdbf5b4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmTb2LujPHA8Xf9sUD1C1VZCVS7scCBkYkHuYPGanq6uz7"]},"lib/solmate/src/utils/SSTORE2.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc5359c92365c550c418725fc534a538426ea8f6e7f6c06c0a9d66647d864469d","license":"AGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://f6210458e51eee25ea58a46924c35522419ed52aecd42c0bcf4519b9568a43a2","dweb:/ipfs/QmWMpKRfioNTXNNsg5eKdgogRanDr7iNPQ11HvykBeQzAM"]}},"version":1}

commit(bytes32).details: The commit hash MUST be keccak256(abi.encode(msg.sender, input))      This binds the commitment to your address, preventing front-running

params._puzzleBPointer: SSTORE2 pointer to b vector (72 x u16, computed as A*plantedSecret + e)

returns._1: The block when committed (0 if none)

revealWithPuzzle(bytes32,int8[48]).details: The puzzleSolution should be computed off-chain as H("planted", secret)  ternary      For honest solver who knows secret, this is trivial.      For attacker, must solve ternary LWE from stored (A, b).

commit(bytes32).notice: Commit to a claim attempt (phase 1 of commit-reveal)

commitDelay().notice: Get the minimum blocks between commit and reveal

encryptedGates().notice: Get the number of encrypted gates in this honeypot

estimatedGas().notice: Get estimated gas cost for reveal() call

getCommit(address).notice: Get commitment info for an address
